title: SSVC display at the Volksworld Show

posts.content:
We are once again back at the Volksworld Show for a club display this year. If you would like to participate please can you add your self to this list. I will post information/details closer the the event date. There will also be the usual rat line up outside the main gate.

I'll start the list:


1. Rikki James '54 Samba
2.

1. Rikki James '54 Samba
2. Kate & Mark Burch - 67 13w Deluxe - HCK96E (Sunday please - Shiny)
